summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Regulation Statement Extractor web app. All core functionality working: document upload with AI parsing (GPT-5), statement table workspace, custom columns, templates, export features, and preview pane. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend UI working well with minor filter interaction issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Filter dropdown options not clickable due to overlay interference

passed_tests: All 14 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Document upload with drag & drop functionality
AI-powered document parsing using OpenAI GPT-5
Statement extraction and display (4 statements extracted)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix filter dropdown interaction issue - the dropdown options are not clickable due to overlay interference. All other functionality is working excellently.
